subject: Basketball (College)
Stadiums and Arenas
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. has moved the Final Four to giant football stadiums to sell more tickets, but the intimate feel in which basketball thrives has been lost.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. has moved the Final Four to giant football stadiums to sell more tickets, but the intimate feel in which basketball thrives has been lost.
